item.title: Edit this code please! Easy!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

case 411: if (c.playerRights >= 0) { if(c.altarPrayed == 0) { c.altarPrayed = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You switch to ancient curse prayers."); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } else { c.altarPrayed = 0; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You switch back to normal prayers."); c.getCurse().resetCurse(); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } } break;

Also fixed your bad conventions with my better looking ones <3

Your welcome.

Also, why did you just repeat the same piece of code twiceâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: Edit this code please! Easy!
item.dc:creator: @okya okya
item.description:
@okya wrote:

Okay that is the curses alter code how do I edit it so all players are able to use it.

case 411: if (c.playerRights == 0) { if(c.altarPrayed == 0) { c.altarPrayed = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You switch to ancient curse prayers."); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } else { c.altarPrayed = 0; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You switch back to normal prayers."); c.getCurse().resetCurse(); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } } if (c.playerRights == 0) { if(c.altarPrayed == 0) { c.altarPrayed = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You switch to ancient curse prayers."); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } else { c.altarPrayed = 0; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You switch back to normal prayers."); c.getCurse().resetCurse(); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } } if (c.playerRights == 1) { c.sendMessage("Sorry " +c.playerName+" letting mods have curses would give them an advantage."); } if (c.playerRights == 0) { c.sendMessage("Hey " +c.playerName+" How did you get here...? STAFF ONLY!"); } if (c.playerRights == 4) { c.sendMessage("Hey " +c.playerName+" How did you get here...? STAFF ONLY! "); } break;

Read full topic
